<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Bomber](/Feats.aspx?ID=5764) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=812" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 63 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You keep your bombs and bomb-related reagents in easy-to-reach pouches from which you draw without thinking. You [Interact](/Actions.aspx?ID=2297) to draw a bomb, draw a versatile vial, or use [Quick Alchemy](/Feats.aspx?ID=667) to create a bomb, then [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) with the bomb. If you have the ability to create more than one bomb at a time with Quick Alchemy (such as from the double brew class feature), you can Strike with only one of the bombs you create with this action.
name: Quick Bomber
